plot: A teenager is enthralled by a ghost who's tapped into her vampire fantasies, and Melinda must act before the girl becomes a ghost herself.

Teenager Karen Westen is enchanted by same age ghost Andrew Carlin, who caters to their romantic vampire fantasies, which may drag her into his ghost world. Melinda initially suspects a dark part played by her adulterous father, who proves genuinely protective, before considering true love.—KGF Vissers
